title: French Serif from the Early 1900's
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112945im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_1_4202.jpg)

Titling from an early edition of In Search of Lost Time.

Any hints at the typeface would be greatly appreciated!

Font: 

 Octavian 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112945/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

author: ariweinkle

comments.content: **[Octavian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112945/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Scriptorium-Fonts&ffam=Octavian%20-%20Regular&fid=e756a0f631e9745bc2772e35e1b873b2&fsize=60&text=PREMIERE%20PARTIE&wrap=2)** by David F. Nalle (Scriptorium Fonts, 1993) is quite close - if not a match - to your sample
